title: Improve your driving experience with this $100 wireless display
content:
Macworld

Driving with a phone in your hand is unnecessarily dangerous. And luckily, you no longer have to wait for a fancy car to upgrade your GPS-viewing game. For a limited time, you can grab this easy-to-install 7″ wireless car display for only $99.99 (reg. $139).

This advanced HD display will change the way you drive every day. Compatible with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, it can make controlling your smartphone easy. It’s multifunctional, so users can safely manage navigation, calls, texts, and music. Plus, it has phone mirroring via Bluetooth, so the screen displays exactly what you see on your smartphone.

It also comes with voice control, which allows you to navigate your smartphone hands-free while driving, and includes a convenient suction lock or windshield mount to make it easier to install on your dashboard or windshield.

Grab this 7″ Wireless Car Display with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto compatibility for just $99.99 for a limited time.
